snippet: The United States should back off from its zealous promotion of democracy in Egypt and the broader Middle East.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Charles A Kupchan contends Egyptian military's bloody crackdown on supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood is yet another sign of the dark side of the Arab awakening; says the United States should back off from its zealous promotion of democracy in Egypt and the broader Middle East and work with transitional governments to establish responsible, even if not democratic, rule.
lead_paragraph: The United States should back off from its zealous promotion of democracy in Egypt and the broader Middle East.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
